Grouped_Utterances: Hi! Things have been pretty good, actually. I shared an idea in a meeting! I’d like to explore my feelings about being more outgoing. Sometimes I still feel hesitant.

It went really well! People seemed interested, and I felt good about speaking up. Yeah, I’m trying to prepare a bit more and remind myself that my ideas are valid. Yes, we talked again about our disagreements, and I tried to keep the conversation calm. It went well! When I’m in larger groups or meeting new people, I tend to hold back. I think I worry about being judged or not fitting in.

I was really nervous before, but after, I felt relieved and proud of myself. I felt closer to her, which was nice. It’s good to talk things out rather than argue. I think I’d feel proud of myself, even if it’s just a small step.
I actually spoke up again in another meeting! It’s becoming a little easier. I think that’s it for now. I feel good about what we talked about.
Maybe I could set a small goal, like introducing myself to one new person at a gathering. I think I can do that! It feels less intimidating when it’s just one person.
